# SRWristTemperature

**Class**

The temperature of the user’s wrist while the user sleeps.

## Declaration

```swift
class SRWristTemperature
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensor/wristTemperature] sensor provides this class as its [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRFetchResult/sample] type.

## Getting temperature information

- **timestamp**: The date and time when the device records the temperature.
- **value**: The temperature sensor value in celsius.
- **errorEstimate**: An estimate of the amount of error in the temperature measurement.

## Determining the accuracy

- **condition**: The condition of the measurement that impacts its accuracy.
- **SRWristTemperature.Condition**: The user activities with the watch that can impact the temperature measurement.

## Recording wrist temperatures

- **SRWristTemperatureSession**: An object that represents wrist temperatures that a device records during a period of time.
